## VWCButton class

This component is an extension of \[<mwc-button>\](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web-components/tree/master/packages/button) Our button supports native features like the 'form' and 'type' attributes

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class VWCButton extends MWCButton 
```
<b>Extends:</b> MWCButton
